sentences.sentence: Below him white asphodels and blue gillyflowers stood abashed and unprotected between the wheelmarks, as though surprised in the midst of a slow pilgrimage from one bank to the other.
sentences.translation: 在他的脚下，是白色的常春花，和蓝色的紫罗兰，在车轮印之间，显得不安，而没有任何防护，就象是奇怪，这个从一处草坡走向另一处草坡的朝圣者，从它们中间慢慢地跨过去，动作是那么的小心翼翼。
